name: Highway Game
description:
Highway Game


You have a new sport car on which you finally drive onto highway, there is a long and straight road ahead, so it's time to press the accelerator!

You are gaining speed and are not going to slow it down and to get to the finish line you have to show all your skills!

Avoid clashes and police, collect coins and fuel cans.

Features:

  • Ease of controls.
  • Responsive gameplay.
  • Beautiful graphics.
  • Damage system.
  • Nice music.
  • 9 levels.
